response.overview: A story involving a Post-World War 3 Setting , intertwined with Current Global Issues , Secret Societies , Ancient Indian Texts , Geopolitical Discussions , and some Mysterious Characters , all of them having their own special skills. A conflict between two secret societies starts, one wants to take over the world and start a New World Order , another wants to Protect and Heal Mother Earth , without any HUMAN INTERVENTION . MADE IN INDIA Full Crew & Cast with Instagram Handles: Executive Producer - Vinay Vishwakarma
response.title: THE_LAST_YUG_Film
